message.body: We let down our guards now we're in each others hearts I want to hold on to you Oh what a find now we're in each others minds I want to wake up to you
Like a bird to the sun that is singing at dawn am I to you Like the grass to the dune holding stead fast and true I want to hold on to you
I can't speak my love No it simply won't do when I'm holding on to you I've got to sing my love like you inspire me to I want to wake up to you Live life as two Im gonna hold on to you
You inspire me. this song is waiting for you in your email
Gabi, I am basking in the sound of your voice; your song is a treasure.
A dark punny chemistry joke for you: Two chemists walk into a bar, one orders some H2O the other says "I'll have some H2O too" and then he dies
:) By the way, I am still reveling in your song...
